SELECT OBSDHM, DAMCD, RFOBSCD, TO_CHAR(ACURF) P_ACURF, TO_CHAR(P_ACURF) P_ACURF, TO_CHAR(ACURF-P_ACURF) ACURF10 FROM ( SELECT OBSDHM, DAMCD, RFOBSCD, ACURF, LAG(ACURF) OVER (PARTITION BY DAMCD, RFOBSCD ORDER BY OBSDHM) P_ACURF FROM DUBMMRF WHERE TRMDV='10' AND OBSDHM IN (#ObsDt#, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#ObsDt#, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI')-10/(24*60), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI'))
#ObsCdList[]#
ORDER BY DAMCD, RFOBSCD, OBSDHM ) WHERE P_ACURF IS NOT NULL
SELECT OBSDT FROM ( SELECT OBSDT FROM HM_RADARIMG WHERE OBSDT BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1,'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') ORDER BY OBSDT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <=5
